title: Distribute Feed to International Broadcaster
description: A league needs to provide a clean video feed (without graphics) of a game to an international broadcast partner.

tasks.description: Identify the correct game and the specific international partner who needs the clean feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the details of the distribution agreement.

tasks.description: Set up a dedicated satellite or fiber transmission path for the clean feed.
Monitor the feed throughout the game to ensure the partner is receiving a high-quality signal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent monitors the signal strength and quality for the duration of the game.
